page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STUART
page.content: When I get up in the morning at{ {6.45am.}I wash and let my dog out into the back garden.I dress and take out my papers at{7.10am.}It takes me about an hour to deliver them.On my return I have breakfast and read my "Daily Record," the Scottish morning newspaper. That takes me up until{ {8.30am. { }I go out to school until 12 midday when I go home for my lunch. About {1 o'clock}I return to school until {3.30pm. After school I take my dog for a walk or dig the garden until {4.30pm.} when I get my dinner. On Fridays I go out to collect my paper money and I finish around { {8.30pm. { }At night I go out on my bike and play with my pals until{10pm.} After which I go to bed.
